Bigger and better Half-life 1.  Runs on Potato PC!  Graphics are better. Got more NPCs to interact with.  It is still a linear one-level-to-another type of game, but the levels are a bit larger and more varied than HL1.

So far the only bad thing I can say is that I found enemies harder now, especially when you don't have the right gun+ammo.
It may not have Gex but it's one of the best FPSs ever made

игра хорошая , интересная, но мне не понравился момент где надо управлять военными. И спасибо что догадались в Half-life 2 episode two сделать нормальным фонарик. а так игра годная для тех лет и ,наверное, до сих пор .

Half-Life 2, no wonder it is considered one the most important FPS games in the medium. I used to think, that it is a dated boring shooter with a lot of jank. Instead, it shattered my expectations and proved why it is considered one of the greats in this medium. Its atmospheric, organic, with environmental storytelling in its very DNA. Levels are handcrafted and the passion can be clearly felt at every moment. Truly One of the Greatest Games Of All time. A Solid 10 Out of 10 from me.
Well, what can I say? It's a classic for a reason. 2021 - still alive and kicking.

A must-play for FPS players. The physics. The AI. Revolutionary graphics at the time. Few load screens in important places; they're only at convenient transition areas. Great game design.

10/10
-Great Story
-Diverse Gameplay
-Good Graphics
-Just the right Difficulty

Игра имбовая, концовка особенно крутая, захватывающий сюжет и хорошая для тех лет графика. Я посмотрел титры, закрыл эту игру и почувствовал небольшую грусть. Те ощущения которые я испытал во время игры останутся со мной надолго и, надеюсь, в будущем я испытаю те же самые эмоции как в 1 раз когда буду снова проходить её. Вообщем, всем советую пройти!
If you like garry's mod you will like this.

The combination of high-level and refined storytelling and mechanics achieved the creation of "Half Life". This, its sequel, both preserves and improves the qualities of the first game, creating an experience so unique and memorable, that the only way to define it, is as "perfection itself".

First Wolfenstein 3D launched the FPS genre; then Doom made it mainstream; after that, Quake set the modern technical standards; next Half Life redefined the genre and made it what we know now... then came Half Life 2 and it set the gold standard for decades to come.
